dialogue.text: Well, whaddya know, gramps? We finally made it to that city I was telling you about!
…looks like every other damn city on the planet. It ain’t special.
That’s because you haven’t seen this city’s crown jewel!
Within this city is one of the most important establishments in all recorded history.
That ramen shop may be in my top 3 favorite restaurants, but this place we’re going to now… top spot, no competition!
And I’m absolutely dying for one of their specialties right now.
There it is! Uncle Hearty’s! Just up ahead!
Home of the best burger special you could ever dream of-
Uncle Hearty's Hunger-Quenchin' Mouth Waterin' Super Stacked Combo Buffalo Supreme Cheeseburger!
Yeah! What he said!
You dragged me all the way to another city… who knows how far from home...
...for a goddamn fast food burger.
Hey, dude, once you try it, you’ll see why the voyage is worth it.
S-sir! Your head is on fire!
I’m well aware. I’m just built like that.
Don’t mind gramps here. He’s a hothead, both figuratively AND literally.
Ah, my apologies, gramps.
Do NOT call me that.
Well, I was wondering when I’d see you two stop by. You lot feelin’ hungry?
You already know, cousin. We’ll take two orders of the Uncle Hearty’s special!
Make that four! This girl’s in dire need of burgs!
…make that three. I don’t eat.
...and she can't even afford more than one.
Three Uncle Hearty's specials, coming right up! But first...
Sour already knows the rules, but for the newcomers here, we got a little rule here in Uncle Hearty's.
If ya wanna order the Uncle Hearty’s special, you gotta sing the Uncle Hearty’s special jingle.
I’m way ahead of you, lady! I’ve been rehearsing that jingle for months!
Just follow my lead, Sweet! I’m a pro at this.
Aha, I’ll do my best.
Singing a whole damn jingle just to order this slop?! You’re screwing with me, right?
Tch… humans.
